sentences.en: I am a social worker, a lobbyist, and a special assistant to the executive director at the National Association of Social Workers.
sentences.cn: 我是一名社会工作者，一名说客，也是美国社会工作者协会执行主任的特别助理。

sentences.en: His lobbyist friend, Jack Abramoff, was heading to prison.
sentences.cn: 他的说客朋友杰克·阿卜拉莫夫已经快进监狱。

sentences.en: Says one corporate lobbyist: "Like Congress, the business community is changing.
sentences.cn: 正如一个企业的说客所言：“像美国国会一样，企业界也正在发生变化。”
